lead_paragraph: The McKesson Corporation, the health care services company, said on Monday that it would buy US Oncology in a deal worth $2.16 billion, including debt.
snippet: McKesson Corporation, the healthcare services and IT company, said Monday that it would acquire US Oncology in a deal worth $2.16 billion including debt.

headline.main: McKesson to Buy US Oncology in $2.16 Billion Deal

abstract: McKesson Corporation, the healthcare services and IT company, said Monday that it would acquire US Oncology in a deal worth $2.16 billion including debt.
